channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Dynamics 365 Server, version 9.0 (on-premises)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Dynamics 365 Server, version 9.0 (on-premises)

item.title: CVE-2020-1050|2024-08-04T06:25:01.087Z -- microsoft -- dynamics%20365%20server%2C%20version%209.0%20%28on-premises%29
item.description: A cross site scripting vulnerability exists when Microsoft Dynamics 365 (on-premises) does not properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected Dynamics server, aka 'Microsoft Dynamics 365 (On-Premise) Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1049.

item.title: CVE-2020-1049|2024-08-04T06:25:01.110Z -- microsoft -- dynamics%20365%20server%2C%20version%209.0%20%28on-premises%29
item.description: A cross site scripting vulnerability exists when Microsoft Dynamics 365 (on-premises) does not properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected Dynamics server, aka 'Microsoft Dynamics 365 (On-Premise) Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1050.
